text: Mithrenes (Armenian: Միհրան) is also mentioned as Mithras, High Priest of the temple to the Sun at Armavir. Whether he ever ruled as a king is not known, although later kings such as Tigran were both high priest and king. == References == Professor David Marshall LangIran, Armenia and Georgia: Political Contacts. In Cambridge History of Iran, Volume 3 Category:Orontid dynasty
title: Mithrenes II
